name: Galactic Meteors
overview: A game that kind of mixes Asteroids with games like Space Invaders or Galaxian. It's a stationary shooter where you have to destroy meteors/asteroids falling to the ground. Somewhat similar to Astrosmash: Meteor on the Mattel Intellivision. Published under the name Meteoriti in Super Game 2000 n.7 (Settembre 1985) and under the name Fire Meteors in Open Game n.6 (Febbraio 1985).
